channel.title: Comments on: Meme Monday: Eleven Words or Less
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLArcher
item.dc:creator: SQLArcher
item.content:encoded:
Mine:

select null from db..table

5billion rows…

50 times every 10 minutes

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Here are my 11 words ðŸ™‚

SELECT TOP 11 name
FROM master..spt_values
WHERE type = ‘A’
